name: OrgApp
description: OrgApp (Organise App) is designed to make organising tasks in your life simpler and faster. From budget planning to shopping lists, and even connecting the two, OrgApp offers a simple, clean and intuitive user interface ensuring you spend minimal time on the menial tasks we all hate.
